docna.cdata!:
Peru - Petroleum Production Enhancement
            Project : Loan 2195 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Peru - Petroleum Production
            Enhancement Project : Loan 2195 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Peru - Petroleum Production Enhancement
            Project : Loan 2195 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Peru - Petroleum Production
            Enhancement Project : Loan 2195 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project are to
            increase proven oil reserves and the production level in
            PETROPERU's Laguna-Zapotal fields on the north coast of
            Peru and to improve the company's capability to prepare
            and implement petroleum development projects. These
            objectives would be accomplished through the provision of:
            (i) equipment and infrastructure as well as drilling and
            project management services for 159 new wells to be drilled
            and 76 existing wells to be reactivated in the
            Laguna-Zapotal fields; (ii) training for PETROPERU's
            staff; and (iii) consultants' services to assist
            PETROPERU in project supervision and to study ways of
            optimizing the exploitation of the Laguna-Zapotal fields and
            prepare production enhancement projects in adjacent areas.
